name: Beat of the Forge
description:
Control your smith by tapping on the anvil, make sure to time it right when the flames behind  him flash white.  Tapping outside of this window will damage the weapon you are forging and make it weaker. Once you have completed a weapon it can be added to your inventory and used to kill the enemies coming into the forge.

Tap on the left or right side of the screen to kill an enemy when they are next to the forge. This only works if you have a sword equipped, indicated by a red ring around a solid green square, which you can tap on to change what weapon you have. Every time you hit an enemy the weapon in your hand will deteriorate a little.

if you tap enough times on an enemy when you do not have a sword equipped they will fall back, and either switch out with an enemy behind them or be knocked out for a round or two.  If you tap on them just as their weapon flashes they will be disarmed for a moment.

Check out the devlog for notes and upcoming changes as I flesh this game out!
